channel.title: Gnome on Harecoded
channel.description: Recent content in Gnome on Harecoded

item.title: Nautilus subversion integration tool. Execute SVN commands with Gnome scripts
item.description: I have been using subversion (svn) for years from the command line... But some months ago I changed my job and I started using windows environments. And I must admit TortoiseSVN is the best GUI SVN client i've seen ever before. While my needs are satisfied in Windows with TortoiseSVN and in Mac OS X with SCPlugin and SvnX, I was lacking a subversion tool to manage my files while exploring files in my Ubuntu (nautilus file explorer).
